name: EngineeringNotationFormatter

license.text: We jointly offer this code here with a unattributed BSD style license (see source files).

summary: C-based Engineering Notation Formatter with a Objective-C wrapper.
description:
C-based Engineering Notation Formatter with a Objective-C wrapper, and handles variable digits, style, and step capability. Can also format numbers with SI-style suffixes.

    Can output strings like 7.14e3, 3.43 M, or 6.32 m.
